item.description:
Before mutants had revealed themselves to the world, and before Charles Xavier and Erik Lehnsherr took the names Professor X and Magneto, they were two young men discovering their powers for the first time. Not archenemies, they were instead at first the closest of friends, working together with other Mutants (some familiar, some new), to prevent nuclear Armageddon. In the process, a grave rift between them opened, which began the eternal war between Magneto's Brotherhood and Professor X's X-Men. 

 

Since we are going to go to an early movie i thought we could possibly go to J Timothys afterwards, but i'm to suggestions on where to go.      

 

I checked the times for the movie, 6:35 pm looks like the best time.  We will meet at 6:20 near the ticket kiosk to the right of the entrance. 

 

My cell is 860-655-3756, if you need to get in touch with me.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be near the ticket kiosk to the right of the entrance. We will meet 15 minutes before the movie starts.
item.name: X-Men: First Class
